verses.roman:
śata-janera bhakṣya prabhu daṇḍeke khāilā!
'āra kichu āche?' bali' govinde puchilā

synonyms: śata-janera—of one hundred persons; bhakṣya—eatables; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; daṇḍeke khāilā—ate within twenty-four minutes; āra kichu āche—is there anything more; bali'-saying; govinde—unto Govinda; puchilā—inquired.
translation: Within a very short time, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu ate enough for a hundred people. Then He asked Govinda, "Is there anything more left?"
